item.title: Onboarding with Mattermost
item.description: I recently joined Mattermost as a Remote Software Engineer and while Iâ€™ve worked in remote environments before, I was really surprised at how amazing this company is to work with. During my onboarding I discovered that they have really developed a culture built around being remote; one that allowed for me to feel as part of a larger team and always engaged, rather than separated from my peers and working alone.
